label: Visitor ID
desc: A unique identifier for the visitor

label: Basket Click
desc: Did the visitor click on the shopping basket icon?

label: List Add
desc: Did the visitor add a product to their shopping cart on the 'list' page?

label: Detail Add
desc: Did the visitor add a product to their shopping cart on the 'detail' page?

label: Sort Products
desc: Did the visitor sort products on a page?

label: Image Picker
desc: Did the visitor use the image picker?

label: Account Page
desc: Did the visitor visit their account page?

label: Promo Banner
desc: Did the visitor click on a promo banner?

label: Wishlist Add
desc: Did the visitor add a product to their wishlist from the 'detail' page?

label: Product Dropdown
desc: Did the visitor interact with a product dropdown?

label: Mini Basket Close
desc: Did the visitor close their mini shopping basket?

label: Delivery FAQ
desc: Did the visitor view the delivery FAQ area on a product page?

label: Returns FAQ
desc: Did the visitor check the returns FAQ area on a product page?

label: Sign In
desc: Did the visitor sign in to the website?

label: Checkout View
desc: Did the visitor view the checkout?

label: Size Chart
desc: Did the visitor view a product size chart?

label: Delivery FAQ Page
desc: Did the visitor view the delivery FAQ page?

label: Account Upgrade
desc: Did the visitor view the account upgrade page?

label: Homepage View
desc: Did the visitor view the website homepage?

label: Mobile Device
desc: Was the visitor on a mobile device?

label: Desktop Device
desc: Was the visitor on a desktop device?

label: Tablet Device
desc: Was the visitor on a table device?

label: New/Returning
desc: Was the visitor new or returning?

label: UK Location
desc: Was the visitor located in the UK, based on their IP address?

label: Order Placed
desc: Did the customer place an order?
